title: Insiprational typographic posters to benefit Chinese earthquake victims
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140425035132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hope-through-typographic-posters-for-charity_3701.jpg)

I came across these really nice posters for sale, (not mine). Not only do they look good, but the proceeds go to a good cause, so I had to spread the message as best as I can.

[My blog entry on this](http://web.archive.org/web/20140425035132/http:/gentlepurespace.com/blog/archives/typographic-posters-for-chinese-earthquake-victims)  
 [See/Buy the poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20140425035132/http:/www.uberindex.net/freshfauxx/hope_poster.htm)
author: gentlepurespace
